descriptionHtml:
Ver2.0
Head,Body,Armors,Weapons Full renewal

Bodymeshes CBBE HDT
Her stay whiterun bannered mare
meshes folder , textures folder , please copy and paste the esp each
maybe the image image contains ENB fraudulent part , please understand
Texture and gross adjustment , please replace - rewrite your liking
///Specs/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Dual wield Swordsman
Use a range recovery magic shout specification

Face Light

 ============================================================================
顔、ボディ、装備類のフルリニューアル
体型はCBBE HDT
whiterun bannered mare内に滞在
meshesフォルダ、texturesフォルダ、espをそれぞれコピペしてください
Textureやグロス調整はお好みで差し替え・書き換えしてください
///詳細スペックなど////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2刀流使い
シャウト仕様の範囲回復を使います
